properties.name: Show

options.javascript:
<script language="javascript">
    $('.duplicate').click(function (event) {
        $('#jsonBody').val(JSON.stringify($(this).data('json')));
        $('#duplicateForm').attr('action', $(this).data('url'));
    });
    $('#duplicateForm').submit(function(event) {
        var action = $(this).attr('action').replace('__ouuid__', $('#duplicateFrom').val().split(':')[1]);
        $(this).attr('action', action);
        
    });
    $('.button-collapse').click(function (event) {
        event.preventDefault();
        let $isExpanded = ($(this).attr('aria-expanded') === 'true');
        $isExpanded = !$isExpanded;
        
        $(this).attr('aria-expanded', $isExpanded);
        let $panel = $(this).closest('li').find('ol').first();
        if ($isExpanded) {
            $panel.show();
        }
        else {
            $panel.hide();
        }
    });
    $('.button-collapse-all').click(function (event) {
        event.preventDefault();
        let $isExpanded = ($(this).attr('aria-expanded') === 'true');
        $isExpanded = !$isExpanded;
        
        $(this).attr('aria-expanded', $isExpanded);
        $('.vertical').find('.button-collapse').attr('aria-expanded', $isExpanded);
        let $panels = $('.vertical').find('ol');
        if ($isExpanded) {
            $panels.show();
        }
        else {
            $panels.hide();
        }
    });
    $('.fa-exclamation-triangle').each(function(){
        if ($(this).closest('li').find('.btn-danger').length > 0) {
            $(this).show();
        }
    });
    $('*[data-copy-clipboard]').on('click', function(){
        var text = $(this).data('copy-clipboard');
        var textArea = document.createElement("textarea");
        textArea.style.position = 'fixed';
        textArea.style.top = 0;
        textArea.style.left = 0;
        textArea.style.width = '2em';
        textArea.style.height = '2em';
        textArea.style.padding = 0;
        textArea.style.border = 'none';
        textArea.style.outline = 'none';
        textArea.style.boxShadow = 'none';
        textArea.style.background = 'transparent';
        textArea.value = text;
        document.body.appendChild(textArea);
        textArea.focus();
        textArea.select();
        
        try {
            var successful = document.execCommand('copy');
            var msg = successful ? 'successful' : 'unsuccessful';
            console.log('Copying text command was ' + msg);
        } catch (err) {
            console.log('Oops, unable to copy');
        }
        
        document.body.removeChild(textArea);
        return false;
    });
</script>
